First to e-mail hanksta_3@yahoo.com gets em'. 

I take PayPal (no fee), checks or money orders.  Include $2 for shipping on any size order and insurance is extra and optional.

T206 - Isbell - SGC A - $13
T206 - Chase - Tolstoi - Poor - SOLD
T212-2 - Lindsay - SGC 40 - $35
E121-120 - Bancroft - Trimmed - $15
E121-80 - Stock - Nice card - $25
